{{Location Intro|description=<p>The Serpent's Heart was created with the power of [[Sunfire Phantasm]]s. It was used to "guard secrets, imprison criminals, and worship the great imaginary serpent, Ouroboros."<ref name="TBC3">{{Ref/Book|The Byakuyakoku Collection|3|Hydrological Studies in Byakuyakoku}}</ref></p>}}

It contains [[The Altar at The Serpent's Heart|an altar]] that is considered the "heart" of Ouroboros, which is used as "a sealing device for storing important objects."<ref name="STDS">{{Ref/Quest|The Subterranean Trials of Drake and Serpent}}</ref> During the {{Quest|The Heart of Ouroboros}}, the [[Traveler]] and [[Paimon]] retrieve one of the [[Reins of Revival Fragment (Serpent's Heart)|Reins of Revival Fragments]] from this altar.

==Lore==
The Serpent's Heart was once known as ''Delphi'', the Serpent's Land.<ref name="STDS" /> This name predates the arrival of Watatsumi Omikami, as the serpent in question is ''Ouroboros'', the great imaginary serpent.<ref name="TBC3" />

==Trivia==
*{{w|Delphi}} is a location in Greece named after the Delphyne, the she-serpent that was believed to live there before being slain by the god Apollo. 
**In ancient times, Delphi was considered the centre of the world, much like in-game Delphi was considered the heart of the Cosmic Serpent Ouroboros.<ref name="STDS" />
